_semantic.core_logic: Absorption bar (|imbalance| > 0.35 + body_ratio < 0.34) 감지 → 다음 봉에서 confirmation breakout 시 진입.
implicit_assumptions: 가격이 안 움직였지만 volume imbalance = 큰손이 흡수 중
_semantic.failure_nuance: Absorption 감지는 잘 되나 confirmation 조건이 까다로움. False absorption도 많음.
hidden_risks: body_ratio threshold (0.34)가 시장별로 다를 수 있음
Max hold (20 bars)가 너무 길거나 짧을 수 있음
_semantic.code_quality: Uses dataclass for CandleData. Clean state machine with ABSORPTION_DETECTED intermediate state.

bb_squeeze.name: BBSqueezeStrategy
bb_squeeze.hypothesis: 변동성 폭발 직전의 고요함(Squeeze)은 4분봉에서 먼저 감지됨. 1분 선점 = 슬리피지 없는 물량 확보

_semantic.core_logic: BB bandwidth percentile로 squeeze 감지 → 상단 돌파 시 LONG, 하단 돌파 시 SHORT 진입. 4분봉 기반으로 5분봉 트레이더보다 1분 선점.
implicit_assumptions: Squeeze 후 breakout 방향으로 추세 지속
_semantic.failure_nuance: Iteration 1-2에서 PF 3.57이었으나 Total Return 0.37%에 불과. 원인은 position sizing (quantity=0.01). Iteration 3에서 quantity=0.5로 50배 증가하여 해결.
hidden_risks: Short 포함 시 성과 하락 (use_short=false가 최적)
Market regime에 따라 성과 변동 큼
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(100 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(15 bars)
_semantic.code_quality: Clean implementation with proper state machine. Uses deque for rolling calculations.

_semantic.core_logic: 4분봉에서 high/low breakout 감지 → 5분봉 트레이더보다 1분 먼저 진입. Momentum following.
_semantic.failure_nuance: Frontrun 가설은 valid하나 false breakout이 많음. Filter 추가 필요.
hidden_risks: Late entry 시 이미 움직임 끝
_semantic.code_quality: Standard tick strategy implementation with rolling high/low tracking.

btc_eth_catchup.name: BtcEthCatchupStrategy
btc_eth_catchup.hypothesis: 5분봉 봇들의 사각지대(4분)에서 메이저 알트(ETH)의 대장주(BTC) 추종 지연 활용

_semantic.core_logic: BTC 양봉 + ETH 음봉/도지 상황에서 ETH 롱 진입. Cross-asset momentum lag 활용.
implicit_assumptions: ETH가 BTC를 따라가는 지연 현상 존재
_semantic.failure_nuance: CONCEPT_INVALID - 프레임워크 제약으로 구현 불가. ETH 데이터 없음, 단일 심볼 프레임워크.
_semantic.code_quality: No implementation - concept only

dual_vpin_cdf.name: DualVpinCdfStrategy
dual_vpin_cdf.hypothesis: Fast VPIN(초단기 독성)과 Slow VPIN(구조적 정보)을 CDF(분위수) 매핑하여 Flash Crash 감지 및 Regime 판별 기반 트레이딩

_semantic.core_logic: Fast/Slow VPIN을 CDF로 정규화 후 divergence 감지. Fast CDF > Slow CDF + threshold → breakout 진입.
implicit_assumptions: CDF 정규화로 VPIN 값 비교 용이
Fast VPIN이 Slow VPIN보다 높으면 단기 정보 유입
_semantic.failure_nuance: dual_vpin에서 CDF 변환 추가. 정규화는 도움이 되나 여전히 parameter 조합 문제.
hidden_risks: Historical CDF가 regime 변화에 적응 못함
Fast/Slow CDF threshold 동시 최적화 어려움
_semantic.code_quality: Extends dual_vpin with CDF calculation. scipy.stats for normal CDF.

dual_vpin.name: DualVpinStrategy
dual_vpin.hypothesis: Fast/Slow VPIN CDF 기반 트레이딩 전략 - 단기 독성과 장기 정보 비대칭 분리

_semantic.core_logic: Fast VPIN(50 buckets, 단기 독성)과 Slow VPIN(200 buckets, 구조적 정보) 비교. Fast > Slow + OFI 방향 일치 시 breakout 진입.
implicit_assumptions: Fast VPIN - Slow VPIN divergence가 정보 비대칭 신호
두 VPIN이 모두 높을 때 volatility 폭발
_semantic.failure_nuance: 5 iterations 후 rejected. Dual VPIN 개념은 valid하나 parameter 조합 찾기 어려움. IS에서도 PF < 1.3 달성 못함.
hidden_risks: Fast/Slow bucket size 조합이 exponential search space
CDF 변환 없이 raw VPIN 사용 시 정규화 문제
_semantic.evolution: dual_vpin → dual_vpin_cdf (CDF 추가) → dual_vpin_rsi (RSI 필터 추가)
_semantic.code_quality: Well-structured with separate VPINCalculator class. Trailing stop implementation included.

dual_vpin_rsi.name: DualVpinRsiStrategy
dual_vpin_rsi.hypothesis: **DEFINITIVELY INVALIDATED** - Neither RSI nor VPIN spike has predictive value

_semantic.core_logic: Dual VPIN + RSI 필터. VPIN divergence + RSI oversold/overbought 조합으로 진입.
implicit_assumptions: VPIN과 RSI 조합이 단일 지표보다 정확
_semantic.failure_nuance: RSI 필터 추가로 신호 품질 향상 시도. 하지만 신호 빈도 감소로 trade count 부족.
hidden_risks: Filter 추가로 신호 감소 → 통계적 유의성 부족
RSI period와 VPIN bucket size 조합 최적화 어려움
_semantic.code_quality: Clean RSI implementation added to dual_vpin_cdf base.

fast_vpin_scalping.name: FastVpinScalpingStrategy
fast_vpin_scalping.hypothesis: Fast VPIN CDF > 90 = Informed move EXHAUSTED. FADE the OFI direction. Exit with 0.2% SL / 0.25% TP calibrated to observed volatility.

_semantic.core_logic: Fast VPIN CDF > 90% (극단적 독성) + OFI 방향 일치 + spread proxy 확인 → OFI 방향으로 scalping.
implicit_assumptions: MM withdrawal creates temporary price impact amplification
_semantic.failure_nuance: Scalping 특성상 tight SL(0.25%)과 short hold(15 bars). VPIN normalization (CDF < 70) 시 exit.
hidden_risks: OFI reversal exit가 너무 빠를 수 있음
Spread proxy threshold (10bps)가 시장 상황에 따라 부적절
Tight SL (0.25%)로 인한 높은 stop-out rate
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(200 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(5 bars)
differentiators_from_dual_vpin: Spread proxy filter for MM withdrawal
_semantic.code_quality: Clean scalping implementation. OFI calculated from BVC. Spread proxy as MM withdrawal indicator.

footprint_pseudoobi.name: FootprintPseudoObiStrategy
footprint_pseudoobi.hypothesis: Tick 데이터로 Footprint Tensor + Pseudo-OBI 지표 생성하여 잠재 유동성 장벽 기반 트레이딩

_semantic.core_logic: Footprint chart 스타일 volume profile 분석. Tick 데이터로 pseudo-OBI 계산하여 imbalance 감지.
implicit_assumptions: Tick-level volume 분포가 institutional activity 노출
_semantic.failure_nuance: Orderbook 데이터 없이 tick으로 approximation. 정확도 한계.
hidden_risks: Tick 데이터만으로는 실제 depth 정보 부족
_semantic.code_quality: Complex volume bucketing implementation. Memory-intensive.

funding_divergence.name: FundingDivergenceStrategy
funding_divergence.hypothesis: Trade around funding settlement times. Fade pre-settlement price moves expecting reversion

_semantic.core_logic: Funding rate와 가격 방향 divergence 감지. Positive funding + price down = LONG (carry + reversal).
_semantic.failure_nuance: Funding rate 데이터 8시간마다만 업데이트. Tick 전략과 timeframe mismatch.
_semantic.code_quality: Requires FundingLoader integration. Clean but limited by data frequency.

gap_retracement.name: GapRetracementStrategy
gap_retracement.hypothesis: 4분봉 시가와 직전 4분봉 종가 사이 갭 발생 시, 급격한 장대봉의 50% 되돌림(눌림목)에서 지정가 매수 진입

_semantic.core_logic: Long candle (2x avg body) 감지 후 78.6% Fib retracement에서 LIMIT 진입. Trend filter (20-SMA) 적용.
_semantic.failure_nuance: V1 (50% retracement) 실패. EDA 결과 50% 패턴 미존재 (win 41.6% vs loss 49.9%). V2에서 78.6%로 깊은 진입 + trend filter로 재설계.
hidden_risks: LIMIT-only exit으로 fast move 시 손절 실패 가능
_semantic.evolution: V1 (50% retracement, failed) → V2 (78.6% + trend filter + 15min bars)
_semantic.code_quality: Implemented. Uses dataclass for PendingOrder/ActivePosition.

iceberg_breakout.name: IcebergBreakoutStrategy
iceberg_breakout.hypothesis: 대량 거래에도 가격 불변 = 아이스버그 주문이 받아냄 -> 5분봉 마감 직전 벽 붕괴 시 폭발적 시세

_semantic.core_logic: V3: Iceberg 감지 (high volume + compressed range) 후 breakout FADE. Mean reversion 가설.
implicit_assumptions: Iceberg order = large hidden order absorbing flow
V2 follow breakout 실패 (35% WR) → V3 fade breakout
_semantic.failure_nuance: V2에서 breakout follow가 35% WR로 실패. V3에서 fade로 가설 반전.
hidden_risks: Fade 진입 후 진짜 breakout 지속 시 큰 손실
_semantic.evolution: V1 (basic) → V2 (follow breakout, failed) → V3 (fade breakout)
_semantic.code_quality: Clean state machine with ICEBERG_DETECTED intermediate state. Uses LIMIT orders.

ofi_momentum.name: OfiContrarianStrategy
ofi_momentum.hypothesis: Extreme OFI (P97) indicates institutional flow that CONTINUES, not exhausts

_semantic.core_logic: OFI (Order Flow Imbalance) percentile 기반. 극단적 OFI 감지 시 FADE (contrarian).
_semantic.failure_nuance: 원래 momentum 전략이 18.3% WR로 실패 → contrarian으로 전환. 이름과 로직 불일치.
hidden_risks: OFI percentile lookback 기간 선택 중요
Extreme OFI가 반전 아닌 acceleration일 수 있음
Time exit (3 bars)이 너무 짧을 수 있음
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(100 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(5 bars)
_semantic.name_vs_logic: 클래스명 OfiContrarianStrategy와 파일명 ofi_momentum.py 불일치 - backward compatibility alias 존재
_semantic.code_quality: Clean implementation with proper percentile calculation. LIMIT orders for maker fee.

ofi_vpin_explosion.name: OfiVpinExplosionStrategy
ofi_vpin_explosion.hypothesis: OFI + VPIN 기반 수익성 있는 전략

_semantic.core_logic: OFI extreme (|normalized_ofi| > 2σ) + VPIN spike (> 0.7) 감지 시 OFI 반대 방향 fade. Mean reversion 가설.
implicit_assumptions: VPIN spike와 OFI extreme 동시 발생 = 반전 임박
_semantic.failure_nuance: V3까지 iteration. OFI-VPIN 조합 자체는 신호 생성하나 timing이 문제. Entry 직후 adverse move가 잦음.
hidden_risks: OFI normalization 방식에 따라 결과 크게 달라짐
VPIN threshold와 OFI threshold 동시 최적화 어려움
Fade 진입 후 추세 지속 시 큰 손실
_semantic.code_quality: Clean with configurable parameters. Uses numpy for OFI normalization.

orderbook_depth_support.name: OrderbookDepthSupportStrategy
orderbook_depth_support.hypothesis: 호가창 Depth 기반 지지선 터치 후 반등 매매

_semantic.core_logic: 호가창 Depth 기반 지지선 터치 후 반등 매매. VWAP/Volume Profile을 proxy로 사용 시도.
implicit_assumptions: 4분봉 마감 시점에 지지 확인하면 신뢰도 높음
_semantic.failure_nuance: CONCEPT_INVALID - Tick 데이터로는 orderbook depth 테스트 불가. Volume Profile, VWAP proxy 모두 실패 (OS에서 ~0% return).
hidden_risks: Tick 데이터는 executed trades만 제공 (resting orders 정보 없음)
모든 tick-based proxy가 depth 개념 캡처 못함
_semantic.code_quality: No implementation - concept invalid due to data limitation

stacked_imbalance.name: StackedImbalanceMomentumStrategy
stacked_imbalance.hypothesis: Footprint 상에서 연속된 Price Node의 Imbalance + VPIN 필터로 Momentum 진입

_semantic.core_logic: N개 연속 high-imbalance bar (institutional sweep) 감지 + breakout confirmation → momentum entry.
_semantic.failure_nuance: Stacked imbalance 개념은 valid하나 consecutive count와 threshold 조합 어려움.
_semantic.code_quality: Uses hash-based bar detection. Clean imbalance history tracking.

td9.name: TD9Strategy
td9.hypothesis: Tom Demark Sequential(TD9) 카운팅을 4분봉에 적용하여 추세 고갈을 노려라

_semantic.core_logic: TD Sequential 9-count 완성 시 mean reversion 진입. 10분봉 기반 내부 aggregation.
_semantic.failure_nuance: V1-V4 volume imbalance filter 시도 후 plateau. V5에서 RSI filter로 전환.
hidden_risks: 10분봉 내부 aggregation으로 tick data 장점 상실
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(14 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(1 bar)
_semantic.evolution: V1 (basic) → V2-V4 (volume imbalance filter) → V5 (RSI filter, final)
_semantic.code_quality: Clean TD9 counting logic. RSI calculation implemented inline.

tip_exhaustion.name: TipExhaustionStrategy
tip_exhaustion.hypothesis: 고점에서 매수할 사람이 없으면 적은 매도세로도 급락

_semantic.core_logic: 신규 고점에서 Top Node Volume < Bottom Node Volume * 0.1 감지 → 매수세 고갈 → Short 진입.
implicit_assumptions: Top Node 거래량이 Bottom의 10% 미만이면 exhaustion
_semantic.failure_nuance: 아직 iteration 없음. Volume Profile 기반 Tip Exhaustion 로직 설계만 완료.
_semantic.code_quality: No implementation yet

volume_climax.name: VolumeClimaxStrategy
volume_climax.hypothesis: 4분봉 거래량이 직전 20개 평균의 5배 이상 급증(Buying/Selling Climax) 시 역매매

_semantic.core_logic: Volume climax (5x avg) + reversal wick 감지 → FADE. V5에서 regime filter 추가.
_semantic.failure_nuance: EDA 결과 SHORT-only가 유효 (58.8% WR). LONG은 35.5% WR. V5에서 MA deviation으로 regime filter.
hidden_risks: Bull trending market에서 SHORT fade 위험
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(50 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_SHORT → COOLDOWN(2 bars)
_semantic.code_quality: Clean regime filter implementation. Climax-based exit levels.

vpin_breakout_filter.name: VpinBreakoutFilterStrategy
vpin_breakout_filter.hypothesis: Slow VPIN(100 BTC)을 필터로 사용하여 저항선 돌파 시 Fakeout vs 진짜 추세를 구분

_semantic.core_logic: LOW VPIN CDF(<0.3) + Breakout 감지 → 진입. 역발상: 낮은 VPIN = MM이 flow 흡수 안함 = clean breakout.
implicit_assumptions: HIGH VPIN = MM absorption zone = 반전 가능성 높음
LOW VPIN = MM이 비켜섬 = breakout 지속
v1 (HIGH VPIN entry)이 16.4% WR로 실패 → 가설 반전
_semantic.failure_nuance: v1에서 HIGH VPIN entry가 실패. MM이 fade하고 있었음. v2에서 가설 반전하여 LOW VPIN entry로 수정.
hidden_risks: LOW VPIN threshold (0.3)가 너무 restrictive하면 signal 부족
MM absorption filter (>0.6)와 entry filter (<0.3) 사이의 gap이 넓음
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(200 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(10 bars)
_semantic.market_microstructure: BVC (Bulk Volume Classification)로 buy/sell volume 분류. Normal CDF 기반.
_semantic.code_quality: Well-documented with clear v1→v2 hypothesis evolution. Proper MM absorption filter.

vpin_contrarian.name: VPINContrarianStrategy
vpin_contrarian.hypothesis: 4분봉 가격 급등 + VPIN High Toxicity 괴리를 이용한 역매매 전략

_semantic.core_logic: VPIN > threshold (informed trading detected) + RSI 확인 → OFI 방향 반대로 fade 진입. Mean reversion 가설.
implicit_assumptions: VPIN spike = 정보거래자 진입 = 곧 가격 조정
RSI oversold/overbought와 VPIN spike 조합이 반전 신호
_semantic.failure_nuance: 6번의 iteration 동안 실패. 핵심 문제: Win Rate 58.8%이나 Avg Win($0.73) < Avg Loss($1.00)로 Risk-Reward Inversion 발생. PF 0.94로 fee까지 고려하면 적자.
hidden_risks: VPIN threshold 0.7은 너무 낮아 noise 포함
RSI 신호와 VPIN 신호 timing mismatch
가설 자체가 invalidated - VPIN spike가 반전이 아닌 추세 지속 신호일 수 있음
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(50 buckets) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(10 bars)
lessons_learned: L001: Risk-Reward Inversion - WR만 보면 안됨
VPIN contrarian 가설 자체 검증 필요
OFI 방향 fade가 항상 정답은 아님
_semantic.code_quality: Complex implementation with volume bucket management. VPIN calculation follows academic definition.

vpin_ofi_scalping.name: VpinOfiScalpingStrategy
vpin_ofi_scalping.hypothesis: Fast VPIN CDF가 High Toxicity 구간일 때 OFI(Order Flow Imbalance) 방향으로 스캘핑

_semantic.core_logic: VPIN CDF > 90 (exhaustion) + recent price move > 0.5% → FADE. Price move 방향 반대로 진입.
implicit_assumptions: Price move + high VPIN = information priced in
Late chasers create mean reversion opportunity
_semantic.failure_nuance: V4에서 0.3% price move threshold → V5에서 0.5%로 상향 (signal quality 개선).
hidden_risks: Price move threshold가 regime에 따라 다를 수 있음
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(200 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(5 bars)
_semantic.evolution: V1-V3 → V4 (0.3% threshold) → V5 (0.5% threshold, faster exits)
_semantic.code_quality: Clean BVC-based VPIN calculation. Trailing stop implementation.

vpin_rsi_mean_reversion.name: VpinRsiMeanReversionStrategy
vpin_rsi_mean_reversion.hypothesis: Fast/Slow VPIN이 모두 Low Toxicity(Safe Zone)일 때 RSI 역매매(Mean Reversion) 수행. 포지션 보유 중 Fast VPIN 급등 시 즉시 청산

_semantic.core_logic: Range Regime (Safe Zone + ADX < 25) + BB touch → mean reversion 진입. VPIN spike 시 emergency exit.
implicit_assumptions: Low VPIN = safe zone (no informed trading)
BB touch in ranging market = mean reversion opportunity
_semantic.failure_nuance: V1 실패 원인: Low VPIN이 trending을 필터링 못함. V2에서 ADX filter 추가.
hidden_risks: ADX threshold (25)가 너무 낮거나 높을 수 있음
VPIN spike emergency exit이 정상 변동에도 trigger
Asymmetric TP/SL (0.8%/0.3%)가 실제로 효과적인지 검증 필요
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(400 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(5 bars)
_semantic.evolution: V1 (Safe Zone only, failed) → V2 (ADX + BB, redesigned)
_semantic.code_quality: Complex with Dual VPIN, ADX, BB calculations. Wilder's smoothing for ADX.

vpin_rsi_meanreversion.name: VpinRsiMeanreversionStrategy
vpin_rsi_meanreversion.hypothesis: Fast/Slow VPIN이 모두 Low Toxicity 구간(Safe Zone)일 때 RSI 역매매(Mean Reversion) 수행. 포지션 보유 중 Fast VPIN 급등 시 즉시 청산

_semantic.core_logic: Fast/Slow VPIN이 모두 Low Toxicity (Safe Zone, CDF < 0.3)일 때 RSI 역매매. VPIN spike 시 emergency exit.
implicit_assumptions: VPIN spike = 정보 거래자 유입 → 즉시 탈출
_semantic.failure_nuance: Previous RSI strategies failed in High VPIN zones. This strategy filters to Low VPIN only.
_semantic.relationship: vpin_rsi_mean_reversion의 초기 버전 (V1) - 이후 V2로 redesign됨
_semantic.code_quality: Concept precursor to vpin_rsi_mean_reversion V2 implementation

vpin_strategy.name: VpinStrategyStrategy
vpin_strategy.hypothesis: 정보를 가진 트레이더(Informed Trader)는 대량 주문을 넣는다. 이들의 거래 비중이 높아지면 VPIN이 상승한다. VPIN은 '시장에 정보 비대칭이 얼마나 존재하는가'를 수치화한 것이다.

_semantic.core_logic: VPIN 급등 시 변동성 증가 예측. VPIN + 가격 방향 조합으로 진입.
implicit_assumptions: Informed traders는 대량 주문 → VPIN 상승
_semantic.failure_nuance: Iteration 1에서 catastrophic failure. 1294 trades/day (vs 예상 5-15), WR 3.2%, PF 0.01. Excessive trading과 VPIN threshold 문제.
_semantic.root_cause: VPIN이 대부분의 시간 threshold 이상 유지 → 과도한 재진입
_semantic.code_quality: Initial VPIN implementation. BVC (Bulk Volume Classification) based.

vwap_reversion.name: VWAPReversionStrategy
vwap_reversion.hypothesis: 4분봉 종가가 당일 VWAP에서 표준편차 2배 이상 벌어졌을 때 평균 회귀 매매 (추세 방향 정렬)

_semantic.core_logic: VWAP deviation > 2σ 감지 시 mean reversion 진입. V2에서 MA50 regime filter 추가.
_semantic.failure_nuance: V1에서 trending market에서 손실. V2에서 MA50 filter: LONG은 bullish regime만, SHORT은 bearish regime만.
hidden_risks: Intraday VWAP reset으로 overnight gap 문제
deviation std 계산 기간 선택 중요
Regime filter가 오히려 좋은 기회 필터링
_semantic.state_machine: WARMUP(50 bars) → IDLE → HOLDING_LONG/SHORT → COOLDOWN(3 bars)
_semantic.code_quality: Clean VWAP calculation with daily reset. MA regime filter integrated.

lessons_learned.title: 1. EDA tested: "next bar return after absorption bar" (immediate)
lessons_learned.content:
1. EDA tested: "next bar return after absorption bar" (immediate)
2. Implementation tests: "return after breakout confirmation" (delayed)
3. By requiring breakout, we're entering AFTER the move already started = chasing

**Next**: Return to Researcher for algorithm redesign
- Consider removing confirmation bar requirement
- Or change confirmation logic to be less strict
- Or re-evaluate the entire absorption detection methodology

lessons_learned.title: The issue is NOT the signal quality (PF 3.57 is excellent) but the position sizing.
lessons_learned.content:
The issue is NOT the signal quality (PF 3.57 is excellent) but the position sizing.
- 82 trades with $36.92 profit = $0.45 avg profit per trade
- Expected: (56.1% * $2.23) - (43.9% * $0.80) = $0.90 per trade
- Actual is half of expected, suggesting position sizing is extremely small

**Next Steps** (for Developer/Researcher):
1. **Investigate Position Sizing**: Why is position size so small? Is the 2% rule being applied correctly?
2. **Consider Increasing Position Risk**: 2% rule with 0.3% SL =

lessons_learned.title: 1. **Regime change exits too aggressive**: Slow VPIN CDF threshold 60 (trend) and 40 (range) may tri
lessons_learned.content:
1. **Regime change exits too aggressive**: Slow VPIN CDF threshold 60 (trend) and 40 (range) may trigger exits before price targets
2. **Take profit targets not being reached**: Avg win ($0.95) << expected TP ($40+ for 1% on trend, $20+ for 0.5% on range)
3. **VPIN regime classification may be unstable**: Frequent regime flips causing exits

**Next**: Route to Developer for parameter tuning:
- Relax regime change exit thresholds (trend: 60 -> 50, range: 40 -> 50)
- OR increase take profit target

lessons_learned.title: Possible explanations:
lessons_learned.content:
Possible explanations:
1. **Implementation bug**: min_profit_for_indicator_exit parameters not properly connected to exit logic
2. **Unit mismatch**: Calculation may be in raw values vs percentages
3. **Flash Crash exits**: Still firing early and overriding the profit gate
4. **Fundamental issue**: The MA/BB indicators simply do not predict profitable exits

**Pattern Analysis (3 iterations)**:
| Change Attempted | Result | Conclusion |
|------------------|--------|------------|
| Remove regime

lessons_learned.title: The VPIN CDF regime classification (Slow VPIN CDF >= 70 for trending, < 30 for ranging) combined wit
lessons_learned.content:
The VPIN CDF regime classification (Slow VPIN CDF >= 70 for trending, < 30 for ranging) combined with MA crossover / Bollinger Band entries does NOT provide entry edge. Trades enter at essentially random points relative to future price movement.

**Evidence Across 4 Iterations**:
| Exit Logic Change | Avg Win Change | Conclusion |
|-------------------|----------------|------------|
| Remove regime change exits | $0.95 -> $0.96 | No effect |
| Add min profit gate | $0.96 -> $1.04 | No effect |
|

lessons_learned.title: 1. Entry signal may be entering in wrong direction (buying when should sell)
lessons_learned.content:
1. Entry signal may be entering in wrong direction (buying when should sell)
2. Exit conditions may fire immediately after entry (min_hold not enforced)
3. Take profit/stop loss calculation may have bugs

**Next**:
- Developer must review entry/exit logic implementation
- Check if min_hold_bars is actually enforced
- Verify signal direction matches momentum (long when price > SMA, short when price < SMA)
- Consider flipping signal direction if consistently wrong

lessons_learned.title: - SL (0.2%) triggers more often than TP (0.25%)
lessons_learned.content:
- SL (0.2%) triggers more often than TP (0.25%)
- Price movement is noisy, not directional
- FADE hypothesis has weak edge that cannot overcome transaction costs and noise

## PROGRESSIVE IMPROVEMENT SUMMARY (FINAL)

| Iteration | Win Rate | Sharpe | Avg Win | Avg Loss | Key Change | Outcome |
|-----------|----------|--------|---------|----------|------------|---------|
| 1 | 3.4% | -2.20 | - | $0.79 | Momentum entry | Signal inverted |
| 2 | 0.0% | -2.35 | $0.00 | $1.00 | FADE entry | Exits kil

lessons_learned.title: - max_hold_bars=10 is forcing exits BEFORE stop-loss triggers
lessons_learned.content:
- max_hold_bars=10 is forcing exits BEFORE stop-loss triggers
- Price doesn't hit 0.20% SL within 10 bars
- When max_hold forces exit, it's at ~1.19% loss (6x the designed SL)

lessons_learned.title: 1. EDA was done on Jan 2024 data, IS period is Feb 2024 - possible regime change
lessons_learned.content:
1. EDA was done on Jan 2024 data, IS period is Feb 2024 - possible regime change
2. The 2.0x threshold may be too loose - generating too many false signals
3. Stop-loss at impulse candle open may be too tight for volatile periods

**Next**:
- Recommend returning to **Researcher** for algorithm redesign
- Consider: (a) tighter threshold (2.5x or 3.0x), (b) wider stop-loss, (c) different exit logic

lessons_learned.title: 1. **V2 fixed R:R**: Avg Win > Avg Loss now (1.23 ratio)
lessons_learned.content:
1. **V2 fixed R:R**: Avg Win > Avg Loss now (1.23 ratio)
2. **V2 improved win rate**: 35% vs 29%
3. **BUT still losing money**: PF=0.64 < 1.0
4. **Breakouts don't follow through**: False breakouts are common
5. **Required WR for PF=1.0**: 45% (current: 35%)

**Decision**: NEED_IMPROVEMENT -> Researcher Redesign
**Target**: **Researcher** (fundamental edge hypothesis failed)

lessons_learned.title: The user's original thesis "Order Flow precedes Price" is CORRECT, but the operationalization was wr
lessons_learned.content:
The user's original thesis "Order Flow precedes Price" is CORRECT, but the operationalization was wrong.
- P90 = too frequent = noise
- P97 = highly selective = true signal
- MOMENTUM works at P97 (not contrarian)
- Longer hold (30 bars) captures the move

lessons_learned.title: 1. Price consolidation < 0.1% is almost always true for 50 BTC bars
lessons_learned.content:
1. Price consolidation < 0.1% is almost always true for 50 BTC bars
  2. OFI threshold of 20 BTC is too easily reached
  3. VPIN slope > 0 provides no selectivity (~50% chance)
- **Next**: Return to Researcher for algorithm redesign

lessons_learned.title: 1. **EDA was severely overfitted** - 65.7% WR in 7-day EDA vs 20% in 30-day IS
lessons_learned.content:
1. **EDA was severely overfitted** - 65.7% WR in 7-day EDA vs 20% in 30-day IS
2. **Signal frequency collapsed** - 10 trades/month vs expected 140/month (-93%)
3. **VPIN filter made it worse** - Win rate dropped from 23% (Iter 1) to 20%
4. **Fundamental concept is broken** - Volume bar imbalance does not capture true stacked imbalance

lessons_learned.title: 1. **TP/SL Asymmetry Wrong Direction**: TP=0.2%, SL=0.3% means risk/reward = 1.5:1 AGAINST us
lessons_learned.content:
1. **TP/SL Asymmetry Wrong Direction**: TP=0.2%, SL=0.3% means risk/reward = 1.5:1 AGAINST us
2. **Bar Size Too Small**: 4-min bars have ~0.1% volatility, TP target barely exceeds noise
3. **No Confirmation Filter**: Raw TD9 catches many false exhaustion signals

**Next**: Route to Researcher for algorithm redesign - parameter tuning alone cannot fix PF < 1.0

lessons_learned.title: 1. **Filter Too Aggressive**: Imbalance <= 0 or >= 0 rejects neutral signals
lessons_learned.content:
1. **Filter Too Aggressive**: Imbalance <= 0 or >= 0 rejects neutral signals
2. **Break-even Counterproductive**: 0.2% trigger causes early exit on retracements
3. **Win Rate Drop**: 46.9% with 1.13 W/L ratio = EV ~$0.001/trade (break-even)

**Next**: Route to Researcher for V3 adjustments:
- Priority 1: Remove break-even stop (let winners run)
- Priority 2: Relax imbalance filter threshold (allow +/- 0.2)
- Alternative: Try RSI filter instead of imbalance

lessons_learned.title: 1. **Relaxed filter helped**: More trades, recovered win rate
lessons_learned.content:
1. **Relaxed filter helped**: More trades, recovered win rate
2. **Removing break-even HURT**: Win/Loss ratio dropped from 1.13 to 1.00
3. **Net effect**: Marginal improvement (+0.07 PF) but not enough

lessons_learned.title: The break-even trigger (0.2%) is NEVER ACTIVATING because:
lessons_learned.content:
The break-even trigger (0.2%) is NEVER ACTIVATING because:
1. TP is 0.4% - positions hitting TP exit before break-even would matter
2. Positions reaching 0.2%+ profit almost always continue to TP (0.4%)
3. Positions that reverse from 0.2% profit to 0% would exit via break-even, but these are RARE
4. Most losing trades never reach 0.2% profit at all - they go directly to SL

**Why V2 showed different W/L ratio**:
V2 had only 98 trades (strict filter). The trades that passed the strict filter may

lessons_learned.title: 1. **RSI filter overfitted to Feb 2024 market conditions**
lessons_learned.content:
1. **RSI filter overfitted to Feb 2024 market conditions**
   - Feb 2024: BTC rallied from $42K to $63K (strong trend)
   - RSI extremes during this rally were predictive
2. **Sept 2024 had different market dynamics**
   - BTC ranged $53K-$66K with different volatility structure
   - RSI > 70 / < 30 did NOT predict reversals
3. **The 0.2% stop loss was insufficient in Sept 2024**
   - Avg Loss of $3.73 vs expected $1.49 suggests SL being bypassed or exits happening at worse prices
   - Gap risk

lessons_learned.title: The strategy correctly identifies mean-reversion opportunities (58.8% win rate), but exits too early
lessons_learned.content: The strategy correctly identifies mean-reversion opportunities (58.8% win rate), but exits too early on winners. The take profit (0.8%) is rarely reached, while stop loss (0.4%) is hit on losses. This is a **parameter tuning issue**, not algorithm design.

lessons_learned.title: Two iterations of parameter tuning have failed to fix the core issue. The strategy exits via normali
lessons_learned.content: Two iterations of parameter tuning have failed to fix the core issue. The strategy exits via normalization conditions (RSI < 50, VPIN CDF < 0.5) before TP is reached. This is NOT a parameter issue - it requires algorithm modification to disable or make normalization exits optional.

lessons_learned.title: The hypothesis was WRONG. Normalization exits (RSI returning to neutral, VPIN normalizing) were NOT
lessons_learned.content: The hypothesis was WRONG. Normalization exits (RSI returning to neutral, VPIN normalizing) were NOT just "cutting winners short" - they were also **saving losing trades** by exiting before stop loss was hit.

lessons_learned.title: **The RSI + VPIN combination is NOT predictive of price direction AT ALL.**
lessons_learned.content:
**The RSI + VPIN combination is NOT predictive of price direction AT ALL.**

The signal identifies high-activity moments, but these moments are:
- 38.9% favorable for contrarian
- 29.4% favorable for momentum
- **31.7% unfavorable for EITHER direction**

This is essentially random noise minus transaction costs.

lessons_learned.title: The VPINRegimeStrategy hypothesis was wrong:
lessons_learned.content:
The VPINRegimeStrategy hypothesis was wrong:
- Waiting for VPIN to normalize after a spike does NOT identify trend continuation opportunities
- The "storm resolution" period is NOT predictable
- Price vs SMA(20) is too slow a signal for the post-spike environment

lessons_learned.title: **The VPIN filter works correctly, but the SMA crossover base signal has no edge.**
lessons_learned.content:
**The VPIN filter works correctly, but the SMA crossover base signal has no edge.**

| Component | Status |
|-----------|--------|
| VPIN Filter | Working (removes high-toxicity periods) |
| SMA Crossover Signal | **No edge** (40% WR with 0.96:1 R:R = negative expectancy) |

Mathematical Analysis:
```
EV = (0.404 * $1.47) - (0.596 * $1.53) = -$0.32 per trade
With 94 trades: Expected Loss = -$30.08
```

lessons_learned.title: 1. **Win Rate is GOOD (58.8%)**: Strategy entry logic is sound
lessons_learned.content:
1. **Win Rate is GOOD (58.8%)**: Strategy entry logic is sound
2. **Risk-Reward is INVERTED**: Avg Win ($1.04) < Avg Loss ($1.57)
   - Current R:R = 0.66:1 (target was 2:1 based on 0.8% TP / 0.4% SL)
   - Stops are hitting, but profits are not reaching take profit
3. **Many trades not closed**: 35 total, only 17 closed
   - Suggests max_hold_bars (20 bars = 80 min) may be exiting before TP/SL
   - Or RSI/VPIN normalization exits are cutting winners short

lessons_learned.title: 1. **Parameter tuning had marginal effect**: PF improved only 0.01 (0.94 -> 0.95)
lessons_learned.content:
1. **Parameter tuning had marginal effect**: PF improved only 0.01 (0.94 -> 0.95)
2. **R:R improved but still inverted**: Avg Win ($0.98) < Avg Loss ($1.29)
3. **TP/SL not triggering exits**: Even with 0.4% TP / 0.5% SL (0.8:1 target), actual R:R is 0.76:1
4. **Normalization exits are the problem**: RSI < 50 and VPIN < 0.5 exits are cutting winners short
5. **Many unclosed trades**: 37 total, 18 closed (51% closure rate)

lessons_learned.title: **CRITICAL FINDING: The algorithm change BACKFIRED.**
lessons_learned.content:
**CRITICAL FINDING: The algorithm change BACKFIRED.**

1. **R:R Improved as Expected**: Avg Win ($1.82) > Avg Loss ($1.60) = 1.14:1 R:R
   - This confirms normalization exits WERE cutting winners short
   - Winners now run to TP instead of early exit

2. **But Win Rate COLLAPSED**: 55.6% -> 38.9% (-16.7%)
   - This is catastrophic and unexpected
   - With normalization exits removed, MORE trades are hitting stop loss
   - The normalization exits were actually PROTECTING some trades from becoming

lessons_learned.title: **CRITICAL FINDING: Direction flip made performance SIGNIFICANTLY WORSE.**
lessons_learned.content:
**CRITICAL FINDING: Direction flip made performance SIGNIFICANTLY WORSE.**

1. **Expected vs Actual**:
   - Expected Momentum WR: ~61% (inverse of 38.9% contrarian)
   - Actual Momentum WR: **29.4%**
   - This is WORSE than contrarian, not better

2. **Why Inverse Did Not Occur**:
   | Outcome | Contrarian | Momentum | Combined |
   |---------|------------|----------|----------|
   | Win Rate | 38.9% | 29.4% | 68.3% |
   | Expected Combined | - | - | ~100% |
   | Missing | - | - | **31.7%** |

lessons_learned.title: **CRITICAL FINDING: New strategy is CATASTROPHICALLY worse.**
lessons_learned.content:
**CRITICAL FINDING: New strategy is CATASTROPHICALLY worse.**

1. **Extremely Low Trade Count**: Only 10 trades in 7 days (target: 30)
   - The "VPIN was > 0.9, now < 0.5" condition is too restrictive
   - Waiting for VPIN to spike AND normalize reduces signal frequency by ~70%

2. **Zero Win Rate**: All 5 closed trades were losers
   - The post-spike normalization timing does NOT predict trend continuation
   - Price vs SMA(20) direction signal is not aligned with post-VPIN-spike movements

3.

lessons_learned.title: **The new paradigm shows MIXED results.**
lessons_learned.content:
**The new paradigm shows MIXED results.**

What IMPROVED:
| Metric | Previous Best | Iter 6 | Assessment |
|--------|---------------|--------|------------|
| Trade Frequency | 37 (Iter 2-3) | 94 | **+154%** - Good signal generation |
| Win Rate | ~40% realistic | 40.4% | Stable without artificial inflation |
| Signal Generation | Often restrictive | Good | VPIN filter not overly restrictive |

What did NOT improve:
| Metric | Target | Iter 6 | Issue |
|--------|--------|--------|-------|
| Profi

lessons_learned.title: 1. **Signal Hypothesis is Weak**: VPIN + OFI combination lacks predictive power for scalping
lessons_learned.content:
1. **Signal Hypothesis is Weak**: VPIN + OFI combination lacks predictive power for scalping
2. **EDA Overfitting**: V3 EDA showed PF=2.65, but IS showed PF=0.79 - 70% regression
3. **Filter Ineffective**: Volatility filter removes signals but doesn't improve quality
4. **Exhaustive Testing Complete**: 3 different approaches, none profitable

**Conclusion**:
After 3 iterations testing different hypotheses:
- V1: Momentum following - WRONG (PF 0.28)
- V2: Reversal timing - INSUFFICIENT (PF 0.80)

lessons_learned.title: - take_profit_pct: 0.5 -> 1.0 (better R:R)
lessons_learned.content:
- take_profit_pct: 0.5 -> 1.0 (better R:R)
- stop_loss_pct: 0.8 -> 0.6 (tighter stop)
- rsi_oversold: 30 -> 35 (earlier entry)
- rsi_overbought: 75 -> 70 (earlier entry)
- safe_zone_threshold: 0.4 -> 0.5 (more signals)

**Results by Month**:
| Month | Return | PF | Trades | Win Rate | Avg Win | Avg Loss |
|-------|--------|-----|--------|----------|---------|----------|
| Feb 2024 | +0.02% | 1.29 | 38 | 52.6% | $0.85 | $0.73 |
| Mar 2024 | -0.92% | 0.56 | 238 | 47.9% | $2.05 | $3.37 |
| Apr 2024

lessons_learned.title: 1. **ADX Filter Implementation Issue**:
lessons_learned.content:
1. **ADX Filter Implementation Issue**:
   - ADX threshold of 25 may be too high (allowing trending periods)
   - OR: ADX calculation may have bugs
   - OR: ADX is simply not appropriate for volume bars

2. **Bollinger Band Entry is Inferior to RSI**:
   - BB touch happens frequently even in trends (price stretches then continues)
   - RSI provided better "oversold/overbought" signal quality
   - BB is more appropriate for breakout strategies, not mean reversion

3. **Stop Loss Too Tight**:
   -

lessons_learned.title: - Strategy is flip-flopping between positions rapidly
lessons_learned.content:
- Strategy is flip-flopping between positions rapidly
- VPIN threshold (0.4) triggers too frequently
- Exit threshold (0.25) may be causing premature exits
- Possible issue: VPIN may be staying above 0.4 most of the time, causing constant re-entries

**Insight**:
The algorithm design has fundamental issues. This is NOT a parameter tuning problem - even aggressive parameter changes (e.g., raising threshold to 0.7) would not fix a 3.2% win rate. The entry/exit logic needs redesign.

**Recommendati

lessons_learned.title: The v2 design is sound on paper, but the **implementation does not match the specification**:
lessons_learned.content:
The v2 design is sound on paper, but the **implementation does not match the specification**:
- State machine (WARMUP/IDLE/SPIKE_DETECTED/HOLDING/COOLDOWN) may not be implemented
- bars_since_entry / bars_since_exit counters may not be incrementing
- Rising edge detection may be firing on every bar above threshold

**Insight**:
This is an **implementation bug**, not a design or parameter issue. The Developer needs to verify:
1. State machine is correctly tracking states
2. Counters are increment

lessons_learned.title: The bug fixes were either:
lessons_learned.content:
The bug fixes were either:
1. **Not implemented**: Code changes were not made
2. **Not deployed**: Changed file not saved or wrong file edited
3. **Not loaded**: Backtest running cached/old version of strategy

**Evidence**:
- Trade count unchanged: 795 = 795 (should be < 200)
- Trade frequency unchanged: 1 trade every 5.8 bars (should be 30+ bars)
- All metrics identical to 6 decimal places

**Verification Required**:
Developer must verify:
1. File `src/intraday/strategies/tick/vpin_bvc.py` was

rr_inversion.cause: TP/SL 외 다른 exit 조건이 먼저 트리거
symptoms: Avg Win / Avg Loss != TP / SL
rr_inversion.prevention: exit 우선순위 명확화, 백테스트 후 실제 R:R 검증

symptoms: IS Sharpe 방향 != OS Sharpe 방향
overfitting_to_period.prevention: 파라미터 수 최소화, 단순한 로직 선호
